arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim slammed for Man Utd decision in Nottingham Forest loss - 'I don't get it'
arts.sum: Manchester United were beaten 1-0 by Nottingham Forest on Tuesday and Ruben Amorim's decision to start Joshua Zirkzee over Rasmus Hojlund has been branded "crazy"

arts.ttl: Rio Ferdinand calls out three Man United stars at fault for Nottingham Forest defeat
arts.sum: Manchester United suffered a 1-0 defeat away to Nottingham Forest on Saturday afternoon, with Anthony Elanga scoring the only goal of the game after just five minutes

arts.ttl: Ryan Yates says Nottingham Forest star was unbelievable vs Manchester United, he's a 'dream' to play with
Amorim admits he is under pressure and laments United‚Äôs lack of forward quality
arts.athr: Ben Fisher at the City Ground
arts.sum: ‚ÄòI will not have the time. We have to get it right, fast‚Äô Manager put Harry Maguire up front as late substitute Ruben Amorim bemoaned Manchester United‚Äôs toothless attack as Nottingham Forest completed a Premier League double over his side and reiterated he is under pressure to ensure his team ‚Äúget it right fast‚Äù. Forest enhanced their chances of qualifying for the Champions League with a third successive league win, courtesy of an extraordinary counterattack goal by the former United forward Anthony Elanga, while United are 13th and yet to record back-to-back wins in the division this season. arts.ttl: Callum Hudson-Odoi return date given as Ola Aina and Chris Wood updates emerge out of Nottingham Forest
'Not that good' - Amorim reacts to Alejandro Garnacho performance for Manchester United
arts.sum: Alejandro Garnacho underperformed again for Man United on a regressive night for the winger at the City Ground.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest 1-0 Man United: Misfiring Red Devils equal unwanted club record in defeat at the City Ground
arts.sum: Manchester United equal an unwanted club Premier League record in their 1-0 defeat at Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Anthony Elanga reveals the secrets behind lung-busting 85m run for solo winning goal against his old club Man United
arts.sum: Anthony Elanga scored a sensational solo goal against his old club to give Nottingham Forest their first league double over Manchester United in 33 years on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Rio Ferdinand blames THREE Man United players for Anthony Elanga's sensational solo winner for Nottingham Forest against former side
arts.sum: Elanga ran most of the length of the pitch with the ball before firing low and hard past Andre Onana to give Nottingham Forest a 1-0 win against his former side.

arts.ttl: Anthony Elanga is proof of how Man United desperately need to improve transfer strategy
arts.sum: Man United have seen more players leave and find success than those still at the club now: Elanga, Rashford and Antony, to name a few. That must change.
